Source.Name: haskell-th-abstraction
Source.Summary: This package normalizes variations in the interface for inspecting datatype information via Template Haskell so that packages and support a single, easier to use informational datatype while supporting many versions of Template Haskell.
Source.Description: This package normalizes variations in the interface for inspecting datatype information via Template Haskell so that packages and support a single, easier to use informational datatype while supporting many versions of Template Haskell.
